title: Provided that the entitlement of rehabilitation area as admissible under this regulation shall be exclusive of the area of balcony
clause_text: Provided that the entitlement of rehabilitation area as admissible under this regulation shall be exclusive of the area of balcony.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
